title: Just got a small patch
body: I know many of us have been having these random lag issues and i was wondering what exactly this patch is for? did you fix the problem already? :3

replies.body:
From the [Patch Notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-514-notes) - 

*The Bilgewater music has been toggled OFF by default on Summoner's Rift. You can re-enable it via the "Theme Music" option under the "Sound" tab in the options menu.*

*Due to a display bug with the new HUD, you'll need to scroll down past "Updated" to see the "Bilgewater" option. Sorry! This option is temporarily replacing the "Classic" music toggle.*
Theres also another problem. The patch wont finish and it keeps saying theres an error. I already used the Repair option and it did not solve the problem. What do you suggest i should do?

Unfortunately, I have little knowledge when it comes to updates/patching issues (I'm on the skins team). 

However, we do have a [5.14 Patching Issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/QKdzynEY-new-having-issues-patching-514-click-here) Help & Support page that offers some steps for troubleshooting.  If these steps don't fix your issue, please feel free to comment in that thread, and one of our Wrenchmen will be able to assist you further.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=aAFgI4c5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-28T23:54:48.187+0000)
>
> From the [Patch Notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-514-notes) - 
> 
> *The Bilgewater music has been toggled OFF by default on Summoner's Rift. You can re-enable it via the "Theme Music" option under the "Sound" tab in the options menu.*
> 
> *Due to a display bug with the new HUD, you'll need to scroll down past "Updated" to see the "Bilgewater" option. Sorry! This option is temporarily replacing the "Classic" music toggle.*

tbh I think it should have defaulted to "ON" with the option to turn it off.

But that's just me.
